name: The Fool
uprightMeaning: A fresh start and innocent trust invite serendipity and bold adventures.
reversedMeaning: Reckless leaps or fear of leaping lead to avoidable chaos; pause and ground yourself.
description: A carefree youth at the cliff’s edge, white rose and knapsack in hand.

name: The Magician
uprightMeaning: Focused will channels resources into tangible results; skill aligns heaven and earth.
reversedMeaning: Scattered intent or manipulation drains power; regain authenticity before acting.
description: A conduit between realms, raising a wand and pointing to earth.

name: The High Priestess
uprightMeaning: Quiet intuition reveals subtle truths; trust the wisdom beyond logic.
reversedMeaning: Secrets and silence breed confusion; share what you feel instead of hiding.
description: Guardian of mystery seated between light and shadow.

name: The Empress
uprightMeaning: Nurturing abundance, creativity, and sensual comfort bloom under her care.
reversedMeaning: Overprotection or creative block; tend to yourself as you would another.
description: A sovereign of fertile fields and gentle authority.

name: The Emperor
uprightMeaning: Structure, strategy, and decisive leadership create stability.
reversedMeaning: Rigidity or control issues undermine authority; lead with balance, not force.
description: An armored ruler on a stone throne, symbol of order and will.

name: The Hierophant
uprightMeaning: Tradition, shared beliefs, and mentorship offer guidance and belonging.
reversedMeaning: Dogma stifles; question rules and reclaim personal meaning.
description: A spiritual teacher between pillars, blessing seekers.

name: The Lovers
uprightMeaning: Alignment of values and heartfelt choice create harmonious union.
reversedMeaning: Misalignment or indecision strains bonds; return to core truth.
description: Two figures under an angel, choosing with open hearts.

name: The Chariot
uprightMeaning: Willpower and focus steer opposing forces toward victory.
reversedMeaning: Lack of direction or forcefulness causes drift; regain control with clarity.
description: A determined driver guiding two sphinxes forward.

name: Strength
uprightMeaning: Gentle courage and inner calm tame wild energy.
reversedMeaning: Self-doubt or suppressed anger; meet fear with compassion.
description: A woman closing a lion’s jaws with serene grace.

name: The Hermit
uprightMeaning: Solitude and reflection reveal inner guidance; seek your own lamp.
reversedMeaning: Isolation or avoidance; step out to reconnect after insight.
description: An old sage holds a lantern on a snowy peak.

name: Wheel of Fortune
uprightMeaning: Cycles turn; luck and change invite adaptability and faith.
reversedMeaning: Resistance to change or feeling stuck; adjust and participate in the turn.
description: A great wheel in motion, ringed by symbols of fate.

name: Justice
uprightMeaning: Balance, truth, and fair consequences come to light.
reversedMeaning: Bias, dishonesty, or avoidance of responsibility; restore equilibrium.
description: A figure with scales and sword seated in clarity.

name: The Hanged Man
uprightMeaning: Pause and see from a new angle; surrender opens insight.
reversedMeaning: Stalling or martyrdom; choose movement once perspective is gained.
description: A serene figure hangs upside down with a halo.

name: Death
uprightMeaning: An ending clears space for transformation and renewal.
reversedMeaning: Fear of change or clinging delays growth; let go gently.
description: A skeletal rider heralds unavoidable transition.

name: Temperance
uprightMeaning: Balance and patience blend opposites into harmony.
reversedMeaning: Excess or imbalance; re-center and moderate your pace.
description: An angel pours water between two cups, grounding and flowing.

name: The Devil
uprightMeaning: Attachments, temptation, or shadow desires seek conscious choice.
reversedMeaning: Loosening chains and reclaiming power; release unhealthy bonds.
description: A horned figure with chained lovers at his feet.

name: The Tower
uprightMeaning: Sudden upheaval shatters false structures, clearing truth.
reversedMeaning: Avoiding necessary change prolongs instability; rebuild with honesty.
description: Lightning strikes a tower, figures fall as crowns tumble.

name: The Star
uprightMeaning: Hope, healing, and gentle guidance return after storms.
reversedMeaning: Doubt clouds the light; reconnect to faith and self-worth.
description: A calm figure pours water beneath a starlit sky.

name: The Moon
uprightMeaning: Dreams, intuition, and uncertainty blur the path; move with feeling.
reversedMeaning: Confusion lifts; name your fears and trust small steps.
description: A moonlit path between towers, animals howling to the night.

name: The Sun
uprightMeaning: Clarity, vitality, and joyful success shine brightly.
reversedMeaning: Temporary clouds or over-optimism; reconnect to simple joy.
description: A child rides beneath a radiant sun and banner.

name: Judgement
uprightMeaning: Awakening and honest review lead to renewal and purpose.
reversedMeaning: Self-criticism or avoidance stalls rebirth; accept the call.
description: An angel’s horn calls figures to rise from the past.

name: The World
uprightMeaning: Completion and wholeness; a cycle ends and integration begins.
reversedMeaning: Loose ends or delay in closure; finish and celebrate.
description: A dancer in a wreath, embraced by four guardians.

name: Ace of Cups
uprightMeaning: New feelings, compassion, and creative flow overflow.
reversedMeaning: Emotional block or withheld affection; let the heart breathe.
description: An overflowing chalice held by a divine hand.

name: Two of Cups
uprightMeaning: Mutual attraction and balanced partnership form a bond.
reversedMeaning: Disconnection or imbalance; restore equal exchange.
description: Two figures toast, caduceus rising between them.

name: Three of Cups
uprightMeaning: Celebration, friendship, and shared joy lift spirits.
reversedMeaning: Overindulgence or exclusion; reconnect sincerely.
description: Three friends raise cups in a joyful circle.

name: Four of Cups
uprightMeaning: Apathy and contemplation; a new offer is unnoticed.
reversedMeaning: Re-engagement and fresh curiosity after stagnation.
description: A seated figure ignores a cup offered from a cloud.

name: Five of Cups
uprightMeaning: Grief and regret focus on what’s lost; two cups remain.
reversedMeaning: Acceptance and moving forward; hope slowly returns.
description: A cloaked figure mourns spilled cups, two behind still full.

name: Six of Cups
uprightMeaning: Nostalgia, kindness, and simple joy from the past.
reversedMeaning: Living in the past or clinging; make space for now.
description: Children share flowers in a peaceful courtyard.

name: Seven of Cups
uprightMeaning: Many choices and fantasies; discern what is real.
reversedMeaning: Clarity after confusion; commit to one path.
description: Seven cups filled with tempting visions in a cloud.

name: Eight of Cups
uprightMeaning: A voluntary departure in search of deeper meaning.
reversedMeaning: Fear of leaving or drifting aimlessly; choose with heart.
description: A traveler walks away from stacked cups under moonlight.

name: Nine of Cups
uprightMeaning: Contentment and wish fulfillment; enjoy what you have.
reversedMeaning: Smugness or hollow success; seek genuine satisfaction.
description: A pleased figure sits before nine displayed cups.

name: Ten of Cups
uprightMeaning: Emotional harmony, family, and shared bliss.
reversedMeaning: Strained harmony or unrealistic ideals; nurture real bonds.
description: A family rejoices beneath a rainbow of cups.

name: Page of Cups
uprightMeaning: Gentle messenger of feelings, creativity, and curiosity.
reversedMeaning: Emotional immaturity or blocked inspiration; play with ideas.
description: A youthful page holds a cup with a surprising fish.

name: Knight of Cups
uprightMeaning: Romantic pursuit and heartfelt offers move forward.
reversedMeaning: Moodiness or unrealistic ideals; balance dream with action.
description: A knight rides calmly with a cup extended.

name: Queen of Cups
uprightMeaning: Compassionate, intuitive nurturing with emotional depth.
reversedMeaning: Overwhelm or emotional withdrawal; re-center boundaries.
description: A serene queen contemplates an ornate chalice.

name: King of Cups
uprightMeaning: Emotional balance, diplomacy, and wise counsel.
reversedMeaning: Emotional manipulation or volatility; steady the waters.
description: A king on a throne atop rolling seas, cup in hand.

name: Ace of Wands
uprightMeaning: A spark of inspiration, initiative, and raw creative energy.
reversedMeaning: Delayed start or blocked passion; clear the path to act.
description: A hand extends a budding wand from the clouds.

name: Two of Wands
uprightMeaning: Planning and looking ahead; hold the vision and map the route.
reversedMeaning: Playing too small or fear of expansion; step outside the gate.
description: A figure holds a globe, gazing from a battlement.

name: Three of Wands
uprightMeaning: Expansion and momentum; ships of effort begin to return.
reversedMeaning: Delays or limited foresight; adjust plans and keep faith.
description: Watching ships from the shore, three staffs planted nearby.

name: Four of Wands
uprightMeaning: Celebration, milestone, and shared stability.
reversedMeaning: Tension at home or postponed celebration; create safe space.
description: A floral canopy marks a joyful homecoming.

name: Five of Wands
uprightMeaning: Competition and playful conflict; test your skills.
reversedMeaning: Escalated discord or avoidance; seek healthy resolution.
description: Five figures brandish wands in lively struggle.

name: Six of Wands
uprightMeaning: Recognition and victory after effort; accept the applause.
reversedMeaning: Self-doubt or hollow praise; root success in authenticity.
description: A laurel-crowned rider greeted by a cheering crowd.

name: Seven of Wands
uprightMeaning: Courageous defense of position; hold your ground.
reversedMeaning: Exhaustion or giving up; choose battles wisely.
description: A lone figure defends a hill with raised staff.

name: Eight of Wands
uprightMeaning: Swift movement and messages; momentum carries you forward.
reversedMeaning: Delays or scattered focus; align aim before release.
description: Eight wands fly together across the sky.

name: Nine of Wands
uprightMeaning: Resilience and vigilance after trials; you’re close to success.
reversedMeaning: Defensiveness or burnout; rest and reset boundaries.
description: A weary guard stands with bandaged head, holding fast.

name: Ten of Wands
uprightMeaning: Heavy burdens and responsibility; prioritize to lighten the load.
reversedMeaning: Overcommitment or carrying too much alone; delegate.
description: A figure labors under a bundle of ten staffs.

name: Page of Wands
uprightMeaning: Fresh enthusiasm and adventurous news spark action.
reversedMeaning: Restless start-stop energy; ground your ideas.
description: A lively page studies a budding staff in the desert.

name: Knight of Wands
uprightMeaning: Bold movement, charisma, and daring pursuit.
reversedMeaning: Impulsiveness or inconsistency; channel fire wisely.
description: A fiery knight charges forward with a wand.

name: Queen of Wands
uprightMeaning: Confident warmth, magnetism, and creative leadership.
reversedMeaning: Jealousy or self-doubt; reclaim your inner fire.
description: A queen with sunflower and wand, a black cat at her feet.

name: King of Wands
uprightMeaning: Visionary leadership and decisive action ignite progress.
reversedMeaning: Dominance or impatience; lead with inspiration, not force.
description: A king holds a blossoming staff, ready to act.

name: Ace of Swords
uprightMeaning: Clear thought, truth, and a breakthrough cut through fog.
reversedMeaning: Confusion or harsh words; sharpen focus before acting.
description: A hand raises a crowned sword above the clouds.

name: Two of Swords
uprightMeaning: Stalemate and difficult choice; remove the blindfold gently.
reversedMeaning: Decision comes, or tension breaks; choose with heart and mind.
description: A blindfolded figure balances two crossed swords.

name: Three of Swords
uprightMeaning: Heartbreak or painful truth pierces; feel and heal.
reversedMeaning: Mending begins; release sorrow and allow recovery.
description: Three swords pierce a heart beneath stormy clouds.

name: Four of Swords
uprightMeaning: Rest and recuperation; quiet mind before the next move.
reversedMeaning: Restlessness or delay in healing; set firmer boundaries.
description: A figure lies in repose beneath three hanging swords.

name: Five of Swords
uprightMeaning: Pyrrhic victory or conflict won at a cost; check motives.
reversedMeaning: Desire to make amends or end tension; choose peace.
description: A figure gathers swords as others walk away.

name: Six of Swords
uprightMeaning: Transition to calmer waters; healing journey begins.
reversedMeaning: Difficulty moving on or unfinished business; face what lingers.
description: A boat glides across water carrying cloaked passengers.

name: Seven of Swords
uprightMeaning: Strategy, stealth, or deception; act with integrity.
reversedMeaning: Truth surfaces; own your choices and make amends.
description: A figure sneaks away with five swords, two left behind.

name: Eight of Swords
uprightMeaning: Feeling trapped by thoughts; liberation starts with perspective.
reversedMeaning: Release from mental binds; confidence returns.
description: A blindfolded figure stands bound among eight swords.

name: Nine of Swords
uprightMeaning: Anxiety and sleepless worry; name the fear to ease it.
reversedMeaning: Relief after despair or lingering nightmares; seek support.
description: A person sits up in bed, nine swords on the wall.

name: Ten of Swords
uprightMeaning: A painful ending; dawn waits beyond the low point.
reversedMeaning: Recovery and regeneration after rock bottom.
description: A figure lies with ten swords, dawn breaking behind.

name: Page of Swords
uprightMeaning: Curious intellect, vigilance, and new ideas take flight.
reversedMeaning: Gossip or haste; think before speaking or acting.
description: A page brandishes a sword, alert to shifting winds.

name: Knight of Swords
uprightMeaning: Decisive, swift action propelled by conviction.
reversedMeaning: Impulsive or reckless charge; slow down for context.
description: A knight races forward, sword raised against the wind.

name: Queen of Swords
uprightMeaning: Clear perception, honesty, and wise boundaries.
reversedMeaning: Coldness or bitterness; balance truth with compassion.
description: A discerning queen gestures with a raised sword.

name: King of Swords
uprightMeaning: Strategic intellect and authority guided by truth.
reversedMeaning: Manipulative or rigid thinking; lead with fairness.
description: A king sits firmly with an upright sword of reason.

name: Ace of Pentacles
uprightMeaning: New material opportunity, grounded start, or seed of prosperity.
reversedMeaning: Missed chance or instability; prepare practical foundations.
description: A coin rests in a divine hand above a garden path.

name: Two of Pentacles
uprightMeaning: Juggling priorities with flexibility; keep rhythm flowing.
reversedMeaning: Overwhelm or imbalance; simplify and set limits.
description: A dancer balances two coins within an endless loop.

name: Three of Pentacles
uprightMeaning: Collaboration and craftsmanship build something lasting.
reversedMeaning: Team friction or poor planning; align goals and roles.
description: An apprentice, monk, and architect confer in a cathedral.

name: Four of Pentacles
uprightMeaning: Holding tight to resources and control; seek balanced security.
reversedMeaning: Letting go or loosening grip; generosity opens flow.
description: A figure clutches coins at crown, arms, and feet.

name: Five of Pentacles
uprightMeaning: Material hardship or feeling shut out; support is nearby.
reversedMeaning: Recovery and assistance begin; faith returns.
description: Two weary figures pass a lit stained-glass window.

name: Six of Pentacles
uprightMeaning: Generosity and balanced giving and receiving.
reversedMeaning: Strings attached or imbalance; seek fairness in exchange.
description: A giver shares coins with balanced scales in hand.

name: Seven of Pentacles
uprightMeaning: Patience and assessment; growth takes steady tending.
reversedMeaning: Impatience or misdirected effort; adjust the plan.
description: A gardener rests on a staff, watching pentacle vines.

name: Eight of Pentacles
uprightMeaning: Skill-building and diligent work hone mastery.
reversedMeaning: Perfectionism or monotony; reconnect to craft’s purpose.
description: A craftsman carves coins in focused repetition.

name: Nine of Pentacles
uprightMeaning: Self-reliance, luxury, and earned comfort.
reversedMeaning: Overinvestment in appearances or dependence; honor true worth.
description: A robed figure enjoys a garden with a falcon.

name: Ten of Pentacles
uprightMeaning: Legacy, long-term stability, and family prosperity.
reversedMeaning: Instability or disputes over resources; align on values.
description: Generations gather amid archways filled with coins.

name: Page of Pentacles
uprightMeaning: Student energy and practical curiosity about new skills.
reversedMeaning: Lack of follow-through or focus; ground your study.
description: A page admires a coin in a green field.

name: Knight of Pentacles
uprightMeaning: Patient, steady progress and reliability.
reversedMeaning: Stagnation or stubbornness; adjust pace mindfully.
description: A steadfast knight holds a coin atop a calm horse.

name: Queen of Pentacles
uprightMeaning: Practical nurturing, resourcefulness, and grounded care.
reversedMeaning: Overgiving or neglect of self; restore your own roots.
description: A queen cradles a coin amidst lush nature.

name: King of Pentacles
uprightMeaning: Wealth, stability, and capable stewardship of resources.
reversedMeaning: Greed or rigidity; lead with generosity and wisdom.
description: A prosperous king sits amid symbols of plenty.
